meaningMnemonic: You know 手洗い, right? This is like that, but way more polite sounding. The meaning is still the same though: <vocabulary>restroom</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>bathroom</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>toilet</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for the 御 is お, the rest is てあらい, even though the い isn't showing on the end. It gets pushed into the 洗い.
